name: Rekha ❤️
greetingText: Get Ready for the special day of the month..🤩
wishText: May krishna ji always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happiest Birthday to you Rekha !! Yeaaahh! Many many happy return of the day ...
text2: see what I was going to do just normal boring wishes
text3: But then I just stopped it..Why simple boring wishes to someone special let's add some interesting flavour of engineering by ER friend😉.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Entry: Because, Yor are very very Special Bestest🫶
text5Content: Happiest birthday bestest❤️ Krishna ji bless u in every possible way🥰 Hamesha khush reh, muskurate reh 💖😉. May this bday be the best birthday of yours..just like u 🫶❤️
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me how u feel .
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
